attributes.action: Premier League Football to be transmitted 'free to air' in England and Wales
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/business-36412394 (Wilson, 2016)
https://www.theguardian.com/media/2016/aug/08/premier-league-tv-rights-virgin-media-premiership-price Cites Ofcom research into match day attendance and viewer figures, (Sweney, 2016)
https://www2.deloitte.com/content/dam/Deloitte/uk/Documents/sports-business-group/deloitte-uk-annual-review-of-football-finance-2016.pdf (Boor et al. 2016)
attributes.background: Since the dawn of the 'Premier League Era', the industry now generates revenues in excess of £3.3bn. One could argue, with such a highly profitable industry, the 'Governing Bodies' and 'Broadcasters' could facilitate free to air games in their respective domestic leagues without suffering huge loss.
